'''Beta 1.20.50.24''' (Android) or '''Preview 1.20.50.24''' (Windows, iOS, iPadOS, Xbox) is the fifth and final beta/''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.50]], released on November 8, 2023,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/21145839566221-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-20-50-24|title=Minecraft - Beta & ''Preview'' 1.20.50.24|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=November 8, 2023}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Realm]]'''
* Player can now launch Minecraft directly into a Realm using a link, even when the game isn't running.
** Example link: <code>minecraft://connectToRealm?realmId=<Id number></code>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.20.50.24 Preview
|;From the previous development versions
|176399|Armor renders with solid textures when applying armor trim templates.
|otherissuescount=1}}
'''Other'''
* Fixed a crash that would sometimes occur when loading a world with custom items.</onlyinclude>
